name: Vertical Limit Aviation, LLC
about: Vertical Limit Aviation, LLC is a premier helicopter flight school located in New Mexico and El Paso, Texas. We specialize in high altitude and high density altitude flight training, preparing students to operate in challenging environments. Our instructors, with extensive experience, teach techniques to minimize risk in mountainous and high-altitude conditions. As a Robinson Approved Service Center, we also provide comprehensive maintenance and repair services for Robinson and Bell helicopters. Our training programs include commercial, flight instructor, and instrument ratings, equipping pilots with the skills and judgment necessary for successful careers in aviation. Join us to develop your flying skills in some of the most demanding yet rewarding conditions. Vertical Limit Aviation is committed to molding proficient and competent pilots ready to succeed in the aviation industry.
